Module com.example.navalbattleminiproject3
Package com.example.navalbattleminiproject3.model.board.Board

Class BoardAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.navalbattleminiproject3.model.board.Board.BoardAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotBoard, PlayerBoard
public abstract class BoardAdapter extends Object implements IBoard, Serializable
Abstract class representing a board adapter for the game. Provides default implementations for common board-related operations. Implements IBoard and is Serializable.
See Also:

      Performs a shot on another board at the specified location.
      Specified by:
      shootInOtherBoard in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      attackedBoard - the BoardAdapter representing the board being attacked.
      row - the row index where the shot is targeted.
      column - the column index where the shot is targeted.
      Returns:

    • spawnBoat

      public boolean spawnBoat(int row, int column, int direction, int boatType)
      Spawns a boat on the board at the specified location and orientation.
      Specified by:
      spawnBoat in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      row - the starting row index for the boat.
      column - the starting column index for the boat.
      direction - the direction of the boat (e.g., 0 for horizontal, 1 for vertical).
      boatType - the type of the boat being spawned.
      Returns:
      true if the boat was successfully spawned, false otherwise.
